original_text: “‘Honor your father and your mother, as the Lord your God commanded you, that your days may be long, and that it may go well with you in the land that the Lord your God is giving you.
korean_text: 너는 네 하나님 여호와께서 명령한 대로 네 부모를 공경하라 그리하면 네 하나님 여호와가 네게 준 땅에서 네 생명이 길고 복을 누리리라

sentences.original_text: Honor your father and your mother
as the Lord your God commanded you
sentences.korean_translation: 주 너의 하나님께서 너에게 명령하신 대로

sentences.original_text: that your days may be long
and that it may go well with you
in the land that the Lord your God is giving you
sentences.korean_translation: 주 너의 하나님께서 네게 주시는 땅에서
